channel.title: Pages on Chris Eidhof
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Chris Eidhof

item.description: I’m Chris Eidhof. Dutch, and living in Berlin. I wrote two books: Functional Swift and Advanced Swift at objc.io. I’m currently working on Swift Talk, a video series of Florian Kugler and me building apps in Swift. I built iOS and Mac apps. In 2014, we released Deckset. It’s a Mac app that lets you create beautiful presentations, straight from Markdown. In 2015, we built Scenery, which lets you present your app designs using great photography.
